parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create single missions display as a child of given display. The mission dialog will be set to the directory given as an argument "root".

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Display]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> display '''createMissionDisplay''' missionRootDirectoryString

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display : [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> string: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[Display]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> display '''createMissionDisplay''' [missionRootDirectoryString,cfgMissionsClass]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> display : [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> missionRootDirectoryString: [[String]] - root direction from \Arma 3\Missions\ROOT

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> cfgMissionsClass: [[String]] - cfgMissions class to use

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[For Type]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ChildDisplay = _Rootdisplay [[createMissionDisplay]] "Tutorial";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> In Arma 3 this would create scenarios UI <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[createMissionDisplay]] "";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Other options for Arma 3:
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Cutscenes"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Campaigns"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","MPMissions"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Challenges"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Showcases"];</code>
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
